<file path="source.java">
package com.aidi.test.oop;
import java.util.Objects;

class SimpleOOP {
    final String id;
    SimpleOOP(String id, String name) 
    {
            this.id = Objects.requireNonNull(id, "ID cannot be null");
            this.name = name;
            this.version = 1;
            this.dirty = true;
        }
    SimpleOOP(String id) 
    {
            this(id, "Default Name");
        }
    String getName() 
    {
            return name;
        }
    void setName(String name) 
    {
            this.name = name;
            this.version++;
            this.dirty = true;
        }
    @Override
    String toString() 
    {
            return "SimpleOOP{" +
                   "id='" + id + '\'' +
                   ", name='" + name + '\'' +
                   ", version=" + version +
                   '}';
        }
}
</file>
